<schema targetNamespace="http://www.opentravel.org/OTA/2003/05" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:ns1="http://www.opentravel.org/OTA/2003/05"> <include schemaLocation="BargainFinderMaxRQ_v3-4-0.xsd"/> <include schemaLocation="BargainFinderMaxRS_v3-4-0.xsd"/> </schema>

<!--edited with XMLSpy v2015 rel. 4 (http://www.altova.com) by Piotr Bys (SABRE GLBL INC)--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.opentravel.org/OTA/2003/05" elementFormDefault="qualified" version="2.000" id="OTA2003B" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTA/2003/05" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:include schemaLocation="BargainFinderMax_CommonTypes_v3-4-0.xsd"/> <!--OTA_AirLowFareSearchRQ.xsd--> <xs:element name="OTA_AirLowFareSearchRQ"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The Low Fare Search Request message requests priced itinerary options for flights between specific city pairs on specific dates for specific numbers and types of passengers. Optional request information can include: - Time / Time Window - Connecting cities. - Client Preferences (airlines, cabin, flight types etc.) The Low Fare Search request contains similar information to a Low Fare Search entry on an airline CRS or GDS.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="POS" type="POS_Type"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Point of sale object.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="OriginDestinationInformation" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="10"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Origin and Destination location, and time information for the Air Low Fare Search request.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="OriginDestinationInformationType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="TPA_Extensions" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Additional elements and attributes to be included if required, per Trading Partner Agreement (TPA).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Flight" type="OriginDestinationFlightType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="Routing" type="RoutingDefinitionType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:group ref="OriginDestinationInformationTPA_ExtensionsGroup"/> <xs:element name="IncludeVendorPref" type="IncludeVendorPrefType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="IncludeAlliancePref" type="AllianceType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Consider only these alliances.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="DepartureDays" type="DepartureDaysType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="Baggage" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This element allows user to get baggage information</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="FreePieceRequired" type="xs:boolean" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Free baggage piece is required.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ClassOfService" type="ClassOfServiceElemType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Requested booking code per single leg</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="FareBasis" type="FareBasisType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Fare Basis Codes requested for main fare leg</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Stopover" type="StopoverType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Requested stopover informations</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="RPH" type="RPH_Type" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A placeholder for OriginDestinationInformation to be referenced wihin the OTA_AirLowFareSearchRS message. PricedItineraryType carries the reference to this RPH.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="Fixed" type="xs:boolean" use="optional" default="false"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">OriginDestination node with flight and fare information fixed. Used in context shopping</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="FullDiversity" type="xs:boolean" use="optional" default="false"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Request for full diversity of flights for the particular OriginDestination node. Used in Exchange Context Shopping</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Leg" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Single leg specification</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="DepartureDateTime"> <xs:complexType> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="GlobalDateTimeType"> <xs:attribute name="WeekDays"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Specify which days of week to consider for departure. Value format: First letter of the name of the day or '_', eg. 'SMT___S' means we are interested in departing at Saturday, Sunday, Monday or Tuesday. Even if there are schedules for Wednesday, Thursday or Friday, they won't be returned in ISell response.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="7"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ArrivalDateTime" type="GlobalDateTimeType"/> </xs:choice> <xs:element name="Origins"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Origin" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ConnectionLocations" type="ConnectionType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Travel Connection Location - for example, air uses the IATA 3 letter code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Carriers" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Carrier preferrence information</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="IncludeVendorPref" type="IncludeVendorPrefType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="ExcludeVendorPref" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Do not consider these carriers for this leg.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Code" type="StringLength1to8" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Identifies a company by the company code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:choice> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="DepartureDateTimeOverride" type="OverrideDateTimeType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Overrides DepartureDateTime attributes</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="AirportCode" type="StringLength1to8" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Required unless AirportsGroup is specified. Cannot appear with AirportsGroup.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="AirportsGroup" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Name of the airports group</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Destinations"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Destination" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ConnectionLocations" type="ConnectionType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Travel Connection Location - for example, air uses the IATA 3 letter code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Carriers" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Carrier preferrence information</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="IncludeVendorPref" type="IncludeVendorPrefType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="ExcludeVendorPref" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Do not consider these carriers for this leg.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Code" type="StringLength1to8" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Identifies a company by the company code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:choice> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ArrivalDateTimeOverride" type="OverrideDateTimeType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Overrides ArrivalDateTime attributes</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="AirportCode" type="StringLength1to8" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Required unless AirportsGroup is specified. Cannot appear with AirportsGroup.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="AirportsGroup" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Name of the airports group</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ConnectionLocations" type="ConnectionType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Travel Connection Location - for example, air uses the IATA 3 letter code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Carriers" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Carrier preferrence information</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="IncludeVendorPref" type="IncludeVendorPrefType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="ExcludeVendorPref" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Do not consider these carriers for this leg.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Code" type="StringLength1to8" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Identifies a company by the company code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:choice> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Cabin" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Defines preferred cabin to be used in a search for this leg level.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="PreferenceLevel" type="PreferLevelType" default="Preferred"/> <xs:attribute name="Type" type="CabinType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Specifies cabin type.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="RPH" type="RPH_Type" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A placeholder for OriginDestinationInformation to be referenced wihin the OTA_AirLowFareSearchRS message. PricedItineraryType carries the reference to this RPH.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="MaxOptions" type="xs:nonNegativeInteger"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Maximum number of options to return.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TravelPreferences" type="AirSearchPrefsType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Air Low Fare Search Request preference information.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TravelerInfoSummary" type="TravelerInfoSummaryType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Specifies the number of passengers and types for Air Low Fare Search.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:element name="TPA_Extensions" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Additional elements and attributes to be included if required, per Trading Partner Agreement (TPA).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="IntelliSellTransaction" type="TransactionType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="DiversityControl" type="DiversityControlType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="MessagingDetails" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="MDRSubset" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Code" type="xs:string" use="optional"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="AlternateAirportCities" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>For each specified location provide an alternate location.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="SpecifiedLocation"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A desired location (airport city).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="LocationCode" use="optional"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]*"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AlternateLocation" maxOccurs="5"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>An alternate location (airport city).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="LocationCode" use="optional"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]*"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AlternateAirportMileage" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Specify maximum allowed distance from specified airport.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Number" type="xs:string" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Maximum allowed number of miles from desired airport.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:choice> <xs:element name="AwardShopping" type="AwardShoppingType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="Billing" type="BillingInformationType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="ExchangeSettings" type="ExchangeSettingsType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="Exchange" type="ExchangeType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="PointsRedemption" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Return information about Points Redemption</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Enable" type="xs:boolean" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SplitTaxes" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="ByLeg" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:attribute name="ByFareComponent" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AlternateDatesProcessing" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="CalendarMode" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:attribute name="NumOptionsPerAlternateDate" type="xs:int" default="9"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ItineraryCache" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="PublicTimeToLive" type="xs:unsignedInt"/> <xs:attribute name="RemovePreviousOnUpdate" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="MultiTicket" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="DisplayPolicy" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Display Option Policy, takes values: - SOW - Show OneWays separately - GOW2RT - Group OneWays and match to RoundTrip - SCHS - Group OneWays, match to RoundTrip and show cheaper solution</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="SOW"/> <xs:enumeration value="GOW2RT"/> <xs:enumeration value="SCHS"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Partitions" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:choice maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:element name="Partition" type="CachePartitionType"/> <xs:element name="Group" type="CachePartitionGroupType"/> </xs:choice> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ReservationData" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="DKNumber" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DK number</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AlternatePCC" type="AlternatePCCType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attributeGroup ref="OTA_PayloadStdAttributes"/> <xs:attributeGroup ref="MaxResponsesGroup"/> <xs:attribute name="DirectFlightsOnly" type="xs:boolean" use="optional" default="false"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Request direct flights between given locations. This defaults to false.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="AvailableFlightsOnly" type="xs:boolean" use="optional" default="true"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Include only flights with available booking codes (when True or when attribute not present).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="ResponseType" type="xs:string" use="optional"/> <xs:attribute name="ResponseVersion" type="xs:string" use="optional"/> <xs:attribute name="SeparateMessages" type="xs:boolean" use="optional" default="false"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Whether all messages should be printed in separate MTP element or not. Works only with PSS response serializers.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="TruncateMessages" type="xs:boolean" use="optional" default="true"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Whether each MTP content should be truncated to specified length or not. Works only with PSS response serializers.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <!--OTA_AirCommonTypes.xsd--> <xs:complexType name="AirTravelerType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Information about the person traveling. Gender - the gender of the customer, if needed. BirthDate - Date of Birth. Currency - the preferred currency in which monetary amounts should be returned.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ProfileRef" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Stored information about a customer. May contain readily available information relevant to the booking.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="UniqueID" type="UniqueID_Type"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PersonName" type="PersonNameType"/> <xs:element name="Telephone" type="TelephoneType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="5"/> <xs:element name="Email" type="EmailType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="3"/> <xs:element name="Address" type="AddressType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="5"/> <xs:element name="CustLoyalty" type="CustLoyaltyType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="5"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Specify a customer loyalty program.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Document" type="DocumentType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="10"/> <xs:element name="PassengerTypeQuantity" type="PassengerTypeQuantityType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Define information on the number of passengers of a specific type.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TravelerRefNumber" type="TravelerRefNumberType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Direct reference of traveler assigned by requesting system. Used as a cross reference between data segments.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="FlightSegmentRPHs" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Reference pointers to flight segments</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="FlightSegmentRPH" type="RPH_Type" maxOccurs="99"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Reference to the flight segments for this traveler</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attributeGroup ref="GenderGroup"/> <xs:attributeGroup ref="PrivacyGroup"/> <xs:attribute name="BirthDate" type="xs:date"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Date of Birth.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="CurrencyCode" type="AlphaLength3"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The preferred currency in which monetary amounts should be returned.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="PassengerTypeCode" type="AlphaLength3" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A three-letter code representing passenger type (e.g. .ADT. for adult, .CNN. for child)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="AccompaniedByInfant" type="xs:boolean" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates if an infant accompanying a traveler is with or without a seat.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="BookingClassPrefType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Booking class code and preference level for specifying booking classes preferred/not preferred in a request.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:attribute name="ResBookDesigCode" type="UpperCaseAlphaLength1to2" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Booking class code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attributeGroup ref="PreferLevelGroup"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The preference level for the booking class.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attributeGroup> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PriceRequestInformationType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Identify pricing source, if negotiated fares are requested and if it is a reprice request.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:element name="NegotiatedFareCode" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType mixed="true"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Supplier" type="CompanyNameType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">This element indicates the supplier associated with a negotiated fare code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TPA_Extensions" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">This is a place holder for additional elements.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <!--Axis generates incorrect code when an element has one unbounded child element, hence added a place holder TPA_Extensions child element--> </xs:sequence> <xs:attributeGroup ref="CodeListAirGroup"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AccountCode" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Code" type="StringLength1to20" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:choice> <xs:element name="TPA_Extensions" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Additional elements and attributes to be included if required, per Trading Partner Agreement (TPA).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="PublicFare" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">This element finds only public fares.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Ind" type="xs:boolean" use="optional" default="false"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PrivateFare" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">This element finds only private fares.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Ind" type="xs:boolean" use="optional" default="false"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="IATAFare" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">This element finds only IATA fares.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Ind" type="xs:boolean" use="optional" default="false"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="WebFare" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Ind" type="xs:boolean" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Web fare</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Priority" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">This element governs how flights are returned. A user can uses a priority of 1-9 to make this determination.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Price" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Prefer cheaper itineraries</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Priority" type="PriorityType" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="DirectFlights" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Prefer itineraries will less connections</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Priority" type="PriorityType" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="Leg" type="xs:positiveInteger" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Which leg is most significant one? If inconclusive continue comparisons segment by segment starting from the beginning of itinerary</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Time" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Prefer itineraries departing closer to requested departure time</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Priority" type="PriorityType" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="LegTime" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Prefer itineraries departing closer to requested departure time, consecutively for all legs</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Priority" type="PriorityType" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="Leg" type="xs:positiveInteger" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Which leg is most significant one? If inconclusive continue comparisons segment by segment starting from the beginning of itinerary</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Vendor" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Promote certain marketing carriers over all the others in returning results. (configured in rules).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Priority" type="PriorityType" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="MarketingCarrier" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Prefer itineraries with marketing carriers in order speciied in Carrier subtags, comparing segment-wise</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Carrier" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Specifies desired order of carriers</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Code" type="CarrierCode" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="Priority" type="PriorityType" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="Leg" type="xs:positiveInteger" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Which leg is most significant one? If inconclusive continue comparisons segment by segment starting from the beginning of itinerary</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="OperatingCarrier" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Prefer itineraries with operating carriers in order speciied in Carrier subtags, comparing segment-wise</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Carrier" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Specifies desired order of carriers</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Code" type="CarrierCode" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="Priority" type="PriorityType" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="Leg" type="xs:positiveInteger" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Which leg is most significant one? If inconclusive continue comparisons segment by segment starting from the beginning of itinerary</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ElapsedTime" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Prefer itineraries with shorter travel times</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Priority" type="PriorityType" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="DepartureTime" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Prefer itineraries departing earlier during the day</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Priority" type="PriorityType" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="Leg" type="xs:positiveInteger" use="optional"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ConnectionTime" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Prefer itineraries with smaller amount of time waiting in the airports during connections</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Priority" type="PriorityType" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="Leg" type="xs:positiveInteger" use="optional"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Indicators" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">This element restricts fares which can be returned in response. If a customer passes this element, all its children should be specified.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="RetainFare" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Currently must be set to true.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Ind" type="xs:boolean" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="MinMaxStay" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>If set to true, fares that have a min/max stay can be included in the responses. If set to false, then no fares that include a min/max stay requirement will be included in the response.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Ind" type="xs:boolean" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="RefundPenalty" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>If set to true, fares that have a refund penalty can be included in the responses. If set to false, then no fares that include a refund penalty requirement will be included in the response.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Ind" type="xs:boolean" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ResTicketing" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>If set to true, fares that have a reservation/ticketing can be included in the responses. If set to false, then no fares that include reservation/ticketing requirement will be included in the response.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Ind" type="xs:boolean" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TravelPolicy" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This element is currently ignored whether it is true or false.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Ind" type="xs:boolean" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PromoID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Promotional Identifier - a string which identifies a promotion, possibly giving a discount prices etc.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CustomerType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Value" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="REGULAR"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Regular customer type.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="TVLYPREF"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>TVLY_PREFERRED customer type.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PREFELITE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>PREFERED_ELITE customer type.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="LOYALTY"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>LOYALTY customer type.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="MultipleTravelerGroups" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This element governs how flights are returned when multiple passenger groups are requested.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="ItinerariesPerGroup" type="Numeric1to99"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicates desired number of itineraries to be returned in each passenger group at beggining of response.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BrandedFareIndicators" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ReturnCheapestUnbrandedFare" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Ind" type="xs:boolean" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicator to turn on or off return of cheapest unbranded fare referred as "catch all" fare for the branded carriers from the branded fares service.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="SingleBrandedFare" type="xs:boolean" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Return single brand option per itin</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="MultipleBrandedFares" type="xs:boolean" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Return multiple brand options per itin</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="ReturnBrandAncillaries" type="xs:boolean" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Return ancillaries from the ATPCO Branded Fares Feature Table 166</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PassengerStatus" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:choice> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="StateCode" type="StateCodeType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="CountryCode" type="ISO3166"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:element name="CityCode" type="AlphaLength3"/> </xs:choice> <xs:attribute name="Type" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="R"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Residency.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="E"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Employment.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="N"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Nationality.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PointOfSaleOverride" type="PointOfSaleOverrideType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Will return the fares available for specified point of sale and priced in this point of sale currency. Currency is overriden by PriceRequestInformation@CurrencyCode.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PointOfTicketingOverride" type="PointOfTicketingOverrideType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="ApplyResidentDiscount" type="ApplyResidentDiscountType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Apply resident discount in CLFE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ETicketableOverride" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Value" type="xs:boolean" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">ETicketable override</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Currency" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Dual" type="AlphaLength3" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Dual currency</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="MOverride" type="xs:boolean" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">M override</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="UseReducedConstructions" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Use reduced constructions (simple fare paths with restrictions on the number of fare components).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Ind" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="OBFees" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="RType" type="xs:boolean"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicator Returning R-Type OB Fees</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="TType" type="xs:boolean"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicator Returning T-Type OB Fees</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="FareBreaksAtLegs" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Force fare breaks at leg points if split taxes by leg requested. By default set to true.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Ind" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="FareAdjustment" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="2"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Capability to specify Plus-Up and Discount Amount and Percentage.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Value" type="FloatSignedCountOrPercentage" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Adjustment Value, can be positive or negative, number or percentage</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="Currency" type="AlphaLength3"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Currency of Adjustment's Value</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ForceCompanion" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Force companion fare value.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Value" type="Money"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="UsePassengerFares" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>At least one fare component for each passenger type must be applicable for that passenger type.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Ind" type="xs:boolean" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="UseNegotiatedFares" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Returned fares need to match AcccountCode/CorporateID on at least one fare component.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Ind" type="xs:boolean" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attributeGroup ref="PriceRequestAttributes"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TravelerInfoSummaryType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Specifies passenger numbers and types.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="SeatsRequested" type="xs:nonNegativeInteger" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="4"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The sum of all seats required by all passenger groups.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AirTravelerAvail" type="TravelerInformationType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="4"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Specifies passenger numbers and types.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PriceRequestInformation" type="PriceRequestInformationType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Identify pricing source, if negotiated fares are requested and if it is a reprice request.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TPA_Extensions" type="TravelerInfoSummary_TPA_ExtensionsType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Additional elements and attributes to be included if required, per Trading Partner Agreement (TPA).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="SpecificPTC_Indicator" type="xs:boolean" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">If true, this request is for a specific PTC and only fares applicable to that PTC will be checked and returned. It is the same as XOFares flag in Intellisell request.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TravelerInformationType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Specifies passenger numbers and types.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="PassengerTypeQuantity" type="PassengerTypeQuantityType" maxOccurs="9"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Specifies number of passengers using Passenger Type Codes.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AirTraveler" type="AirTravelerType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Information profiling the person traveling Gender - the gender of the customer, if needed BirthDate - Date of Birth Currency - the preferred currency in which monetary amounts should be returned.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TravelerInfoSummary_TPA_ExtensionsType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="TravelerRating" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Customer Value Scores and Frequent Flyer Tiers for one traveler. It can influence Availability results when provided.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Score" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Value" type="xs:integer" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="Carrier" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="FrequentFlyer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Tier" type="xs:integer" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="Carrier" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TravelerRefNumberType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A reference place holder used as a pointer to link back to the traveler.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:attribute name="RPH" type="RPH_Type"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Reference place holder.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:attributeGroup name="CodeListAirGroup"> <xs:attributeGroup ref="CodeListGroup"/> <xs:attribute name="SecondaryCode" type="StringLength1to16" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">An additional attribute to allow flexibility for particular organizations who require an additional code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="SupplierCode" type="StringLength1to16" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">An additional attribute to allow flexibility for particular organizations who require an additional supplier code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:attributeGroup> <xs:attributeGroup name="PriceRequestAttributes"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Attribute collection used to describe a price request.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:attribute name="FareQualifier" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Fare Type is specific to a specific fare and this is a request for a set of fares based on these qualifiers.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:union memberTypes="OTA_CodeType xs:boolean"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="NegotiatedFaresOnly" type="xs:boolean"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">If set to true then returned fares need to match requested AcccountCode/CorpID on all fare components</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="CurrencyCode" type="AlphaLength3"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Type of funds preferred for reviewing monetary values, in ISO 4217 codes.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="PricingSource" type="RequestPricingSourceType" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">It can be used to indicate whether the fare is public or private.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="Reprice" type="xs:boolean" use="optional"/> <xs:attribute name="ProcessThruFaresOnly" type="xs:boolean" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Activates processing of thru fares only.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="PurchaseDate" type="xs:date" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Specify purchase date. Fares returned will be based on the purchase date.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="PurchaseTime" type="xs:string" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Specify purchase time. Fares returned will be based on the purchase time.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="NetFaresUsed" type="xs:boolean" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Set to true when exchange ticket uses net fare.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="BypassAdvancePurchase" type="BypassAdvancePurchaseType" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Controls advance purchase validation logic for repricing. Values 'T'/'F' can be used by AS, for TN the only valid option is 'N'.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:attributeGroup> <!--END PriceRequestAttributes--> <xs:simpleType name="BypassAdvancePurchaseType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Controls advance purchase validation logic for repricing. Values 'T'/'F' can be used by AS, for TN the only valid option is 'N'.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="T"/> <xs:enumeration value="F"/> <xs:enumeration value="N"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="RequestPricingSourceType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">It can be used to indicate whether the fare is public or private.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Published"/> <xs:enumeration value="Private"/> <xs:enumeration value="Both"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--OTA_AirPreferences.xsd--> <xs:complexType name="AirSearchPrefsType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Defines user preferences to be used in conducting a search.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="VendorPref" type="CompanyNamePrefType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Specify vendors to include and exclude from the response.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="VendorPrefApplicability" type="VendorPrefApplicabilityType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="2"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Specifies if online or interline carrier selection logic should be applied for provided carrier type. One instance per carrier type.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="VendorPrefPairing" type="VendorPrefPairingType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Specifies which marketing and operating carrier pairs are preferred or unacceptable.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="FlightTypePref" type="FlightTypePrefType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Defines preferred flight characteristics to be used in a search.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="FareRestrictPref" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="4"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Constrains a fare search to those with restrictions that satisfy user-imposed limitations.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="FareRestrictPrefType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="AdvResTicketing" type="AdvResTicketingType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Identifies whether advance reservation or ticketing restrictions are acceptable in the search results.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="StayRestrictions" type="StayRestrictionsType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Identifies whether restrictions on minimum or maximum stays should be included in the search results.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="VoluntaryChanges" type="VoluntaryChangesType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Identifies whether penalties associated with voluntary changes should be included in the search results.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="EquipPref" type="EquipmentTypePref" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="9"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Defines preferred equipment profile(s) to be used in a search.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CabinPref" type="CabinPrefType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="3"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Defines preferred cabin(s) to be used in a search. The Cabin type specified in a OriginDestinationInformation/TPA_Extensions overrides this Cabin type for that specific segment/leg. If a Cabin type is not specified in a OriginDestinationInformation/TPA_Extensions the cabin type in this element will be used as default cabin type for that segment/leg.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TicketDistribPref" type="TicketDistribPrefType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="3"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Defines Distribution prefernces.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TPA_Extensions" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Additional elements and attributes to be included if required, per Trading Partner Agreement (TPA).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:group ref="TravelPreferencesTPA_ExtensionsDepartureArrivalWindowGroup"/> <xs:element name="BaseFlights" type="BaseFlights" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="ExcludeVendorPref" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This element allows a user to exclude certain carriers from the search.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Code" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Identifies a company by the company code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="8"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="IncludeAlliancePref" Information</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Status" type="xs:short" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Frequent Flyer Status</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="AirlineCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Airline Carrier Code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SpanishFamilyDiscount" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Level" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Spanish Large Family Discount Level. Valid values are 1 or 2.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:short"> <xs:enumeration value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="2"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Baggage" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This element allows user to get baggage information</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="RequestType" type="BaggageRequestType" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Determines type of baggage processing result.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="Description" type="xs:boolean" use="optional" default="false"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Turns on additional text output in response, see Description1 (D01) and Description2 (D02) in response.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="RequestedPieces" use="optional" type="xs:unsignedShort"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Number of baggage pieces requested</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="FreePieceRequired" type="xs:boolean" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Free baggage piece is required on the whole journey.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="InterlineBrands" type="InterlineBrandsType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="CommissionCodeQualifiers" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="CommissionCodeQualifier" maxOccurs="4"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Code" type="CommissionCode" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attributeGroup ref="SmokingIndicatorGroup"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Request smoking flights in response. Defaults to false - no desire for smoking flights.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attributeGroup> <xs:attribute name="OnTimeRate" type="Percentage" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Request for flights in response that meet the given Department of Transport on-time rate. This is a number between 0 and 100.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="ETicketDesired" type="xs:boolean" use="optional" default="false"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Request flights that are e-ticketable in the response.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="ValidInterlineTicket" type="xs:boolean" use="optional" default="false"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Request options that are validated on base of interline ticketing aggrement.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="MaxStopsQuantity" type="Numeric0to999" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Request flights that have no more than the requested number of stops.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="UseAllFlights" type="xs:boolean" use="optional" default="false"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Each flight should appear at least once.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="AllFlightsData" type="xs:boolean" use="optional" default="false"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Return flights not combinable into roundtrips as one ways is a separate section.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="Hybrid" type="xs:boolean" use="optional" default="true"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>If false no solutions priced outside of ATSE systems will be returned in response for carriers operating in hybrid content distribution model.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="LookForAlternatives" type="xs:boolean" use="optional" default="true"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>If false no alternative solutions will be returned in response</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="ApplicabilityEnumType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Specifies carrier selection method.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="AllSegments"/> <xs:enumeration value="AtLeastOneSegment"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="CabinPrefType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates preferences for choice of airline cabin for a given travel situation.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:attributeGroup ref="PreferLevelGroup"/> <xs:attribute name="Cabin" type="CabinType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Specify cabin type.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="EquipmentTypePref"> <xs:simpleContent> <xs:extension base="EquipmentType"> <xs:attributeGroup ref="PreferLevelGroup"/> <xs:attribute name="WideBody" type="xs:boolean" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Specify if equipment should have a wide body or not.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:extension> </xs:simpleContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="FareRestrictPrefType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Identifies preferences for airfare restrictions acceptable or not acceptable for a given travel situation.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:attributeGroup ref="PreferLevelGroup"/> <xs:attribute name="FareRestriction" type="OTA_CodeType" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Refer to OTA Code List Fare Restriction (FAR).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="FlightTypePrefType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates preferences for certain types of flights, such type="FlightTypeType" use="optional"/> <xs:attribute name="MaxConnections" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates that if connection is chosen, then this attribute defines the maximum number of connections preferred.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:union memberTypes="xs:nonNegativeInteger xs:boolean"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="VendorPrefApplicabilityType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Specifies if online or interline carrier selection logic should be applied for <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Specifies what type of carrier it applies to.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="VendorPrefPairingType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Specifies which marketing and operating carrier pairs are preferred or unacceptable.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="VendorPref" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:complexType> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Specify vendors preferred or unacceptable in the response.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:attribute name="Code" type="CarrierCode" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="Type" type="CarrierType"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="PreferLevel" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Used to specify a preference level for all carrier combinations inside one element.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Unacceptable"/> <xs:enumeration value="Preferred"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="Applicability" type="ApplicabilityEnumType" default="AllSegments"/> </xs:complexType> <!--OTA_CommonPrefs.xsd--> <xs:complexType name="CompanyNamePrefType"> ref="PreferLevelGroup"/> <xs:attribute name="Type" type="CarrierType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Specifies what type of carrier it applies to.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:extension> </xs:simpleContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TicketDistribPrefType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Type of ticket distribution to be used with this collection of preferences.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleContent> <xs:extension base="StringLength0to64"> <xs:attributeGroup ref="PreferLevelGroup"/> <xs:attribute name="DistribType" type="OTA_CodeType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Ticket distribution method; such as Fax, Email, Courier, Mail, Airport_Pickup, City_Office, Hotel_Desk,
