<xs:attribute name="DateFlexibility" type="xs:nonNegativeInteger"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The number of alternate days around the travel date to search.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="MaxOptionsPerDate" type="xs:nonNegativeInteger"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Number of options for requested date.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="ConnectionTimeMin" type="xs:nonNegativeInteger"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Minimal amount of time between flights</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="ConnectionTimeMax" type="xs:nonNegativeInteger"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Maximal amount of time between flights</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TravelDateTimeType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Date and time of trip, that allows specifying a time window before and after the given date.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="DepartureDateTime" type="IntDateTime"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This date should be of the form YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ArrivalDateTime" type="IntDateTime"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This date should be of the form YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="DepartureDates"> <xs:complexType> <xs:choice maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>If both LengthOfStay (LengthOfStay, LengthOfStayRange) and Days (Day, DaysRange) tags are used, then as requested dates we are considering intersection between two groups of dates, first group is created by sum of dates specified in Day and DaysRange tags, second group is created by LengthOfStay and LengthOfStayRange
Example: outbound departing on 2014 Jan 20 and inbound with: LengthOfStayRange/@MinDays="1", LengthOfStayRange/@MaxDays="3", DaysRange/@FromDate="2014-01-22", DaysRange/@ToDate="2014-01-24" after intersection gave us inbound departing range: [ 2014-01-22 ; 2014-01-23 ]</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:group ref="MultipleDatesGroup"/> <xs:choice maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:element name="LengthOfStay"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amount of days between previous leg's DEPARTURE date and current leg's DEPARTURE date. NOTE: Allowed only in 2nd or further "OriginDestinationInformation".
Example: for outbound departing on Jan 20, LengthOfStay/@Days="2" means inbound departing on Jan 22.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Days" type="xs:unsignedShort" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="LengthOfStayRange"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>See comment on "LengthOfStay" element.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="MinDays" type="xs:unsignedShort" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(inclusive)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="MaxDays" type="xs:unsignedShort" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(inclusive)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:choice> </xs:choice> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ArrivalDates"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Allowed only for Advanced Calendar API.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:group ref="MultipleDatesGroup"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:choice> <xs:element name="DepartureWindow" type="TimeWindowType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This should be of the form HHMMHHMM.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ArrivalWindow" type="TimeWindowType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This should be of the form HHMMHHMM.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="UniqueID_Type"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">An identifier used to uniquely reference an object in a system (e.g. an airline reservation reference, customer profile reference, booking confirmation number, or a reference to a previous availability quote).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="CompanyName" type="CompanyNameType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Identifies the company that is associated with the UniqueID.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attributeGroup ref="UniqueID_Group"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TaxCodeType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Defines the data fields available for tax code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:attribute name="TaxCode" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Identifies the code for the tax.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z0-9]{2}[A-Z0-9]{0,1}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TaxCodeAmountType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Defines the data fields available for tax code and amount.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="TaxCodeType"> <xs:attribute name="Amount" type="Money" use="optional"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:attributeGroup name="BirthDateGroup"> <xs:attribute name="BirthDate" type="xs:date" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates the date of birth as indicated in the document, in ISO 8601 prescribed format.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:attributeGroup> <xs:attributeGroup name="CodeListGroup"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Used to specify a code and its associated attributes; meaning is derived from actual use.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:attribute name="Code" type="CorporateIDType" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Any code used to specify an item, for example, type of traveler, service code, room amenity, etc.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="CodeContext" type="StringLength1to32" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Identifies the source authority for the code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="URI" type="xs:anyURI" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Identifies the location of the code table</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attributeGroup ref="QuantityGroup"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Specifies the number of items that are identified by the Code (e.g., 2 adults, 5 first class seats).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attributeGroup> </xs:attributeGroup> <xs:attributeGroup name="DefaultIndGroup"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates that the receiving system should assume the default value if the user specifies no overriding value or action.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:attribute name="DefaultInd" type="xs:boolean" use="optional" default="false"/> </xs:attributeGroup> <xs:attributeGroup name="EffectiveExpireOptionalDateGroup"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Used to send the effective date and/or expiration date.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:attribute name="EffectiveDate" type="xs:date" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates the starting date.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="ExpireDate" type="xs:date" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates the ending date.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:attributeGroup> <xs:attributeGroup name="FormattedInd"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Identifies if the associated data is formatted into its individual pieces, or exists as a single entity.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:attribute name="FormattedInd" type="xs:boolean" use="optional" default="false"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Specifies if the associated data is formatted or not. If true, then it is formatted, if false, then not formatted.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:attributeGroup> <xs:attributeGroup name="GenderGroup"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Used to indicate the gender of a person, if known.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:attribute name="Gender" use="optional"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:NMTOKEN"> <xs:enumeration value="Male"/> <xs:enumeration value="Female"/> <xs:enumeration value="Unknown"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:attributeGroup> <xs:attributeGroup name="ID_Group"> <xs:attribute name="ID" type="StringLength1to32" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:attributeGroup> <xs:attributeGroup name="LoyalLevelGroup"> <xs:attribute name="LoyalLevel" type="StringLength1to16"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates special privileges in program assigned to individual.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:attributeGroup> <xs:attributeGroup name="MaxResponsesGroup"> <xs:attribute name="MaxResponses" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A positive integer value that indicates the maximum number of responses desired in the return.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:union memberTypes="xs:positiveInteger xs:integer"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:attributeGroup> <xs:attributeGroup name="PositionGroup"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Defines geographical position.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:attribute name="Latitude" type="StringLength1to16" use="optional"/> <xs:attribute name="Longitude" type="StringLength1to16" use="optional"/> <xs:attribute name="Altitude" type="StringLength1to16" use="optional"/> </xs:attributeGroup> <xs:attributeGroup name="PreferLevelGroup"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Used to indicate a level of preference for an associate item, only, unacceptable, preferred.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:attribute name="PreferLevel" type="PreferLevelType" default="Preferred"/> </xs:attributeGroup> <xs:attributeGroup name="PrivacyGroup"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The two Privacy attributes allow for control of the sharing of data between parties.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:attribute name="ShareSynchInd" use="optional"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">value="Inherit" Permission for sharing data for synchronization of information held by other travel service providers.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:NMTOKEN"> <xs:enumeration value="Yes"/> <xs:enumeration value="No"/> <xs:enumeration value="Inherit"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="ShareMarketInd" use="optional"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">value="Inherit" Permission for sharing data for marketing purposes.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:NMTOKEN"> <xs:enumeration value="Yes"/> <xs:enumeration value="No"/> <xs:enumeration value="Inherit"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:attributeGroup> <xs:attributeGroup name="SignupDateGroup"> <xs:attribute name="SignupDate" type="xs:date" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates when the member signed up for the loyalty program.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:attributeGroup> <xs:attributeGroup name="SingleVendorIndGroup"> <xs:attribute name="SingleVendorInd"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates if program is affiliated with a group of related offers accumulating credits.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:NMTOKEN"> <xs:enumeration value="SingleVndr"/> <xs:enumeration value="Alliance"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:attributeGroup> <xs:attributeGroup name="SmokingIndicatorGroup"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Identifies a position with regard to the smoking of cigarettes, either Allowed or NotAllowed. This may be of use when expressing a preference (I prefer a room that allows smoking) or when stating the attributes of an item (smoking in this rental car is not allowed).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:attribute name="SmokingAllowed" type="xs:boolean" use="optional" default="false"/> </xs:attributeGroup> <xs:attributeGroup name="TelephoneAttributesGroup"> <xs:attribute name="PhoneLocationType" type="OTA_CodeType" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Refer to OTA Code List Phone Location Type (PLT).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="PhoneTechType" type="OTA_CodeType" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates type of technology associated with this telephone number, such as Voice, Data, Fax, Pager, Mobile, TTY, etc. Refer to OTA Code List Phone Technology Type (PTT).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="CountryAccessCode" type="NumericStringLength1to3" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Code assigned by telecommunications authorities for international country access identifier.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="AreaCityCode" type="NumericStringLength1to8" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Code assigned for telephones in a specific region, city, or area.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="PhoneNumber" type="StringLength1to32" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Telephone number assigned to a single location.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="Extension" type="NumericStringLength1to5" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Extension to reach a specific party at the phone number.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="PIN" type="StringLength1to8" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Additional codes used for pager or telephone access rights.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:attributeGroup> <xs:attributeGroup name="UniqueID_Group"> <xs:attribute name="URL" type="xs:anyURI"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">URL that identifies the location associated with the record identified by the UniqueID.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="Type" type="OTA_CodeType" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element. Refer to OTA Code List Unique ID Type (UIT).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="Instance" type="StringLength1to32"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The identification of a record as it exists at a point in time. An instance is used in update messages where the sender must assure the server that the update sent refers to the most recent modification level of the object being updated.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attributeGroup ref="ID_Group"/> <xs:attribute name="ID_Context" type="StringLength1to32" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Used to identify the source of the identifier (e.g. IATA, ABTA, etc.).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:attributeGroup> <!--OTA_SimpleTypes.xsd--> <xs:simpleType name="CabinType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A cabin is either Premium First (P), First (F), Premium Business (J), Business (C), Premium Economy (S) or Economy (Y)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:NMTOKEN"> <xs:enumeration value="PremiumFirst"/> <xs:enumeration value="First"/> <xs:enumeration value="PremiumBusiness"/> <xs:enumeration value="Business"/> <xs:enumeration value="PremiumEconomy"/> <xs:enumeration value="Economy"/> <xs:enumeration value="Y"/> <xs:enumeration value="S"/> <xs:enumeration value="C"/> <xs:enumeration value="J"/> <xs:enumeration value="F"/> <xs:enumeration value="P"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FlightTypeType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Identifies a particular type of flight - Direct, Stopover etc.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:NMTOKEN"> <xs:enumeration value="Nonstop"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Flight without plane change and without intermediate landing.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Direct"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Flight without plane change and possible intermediate landing.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Connection"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Flight with plane changes, allowing maximum of 24 hours for each change</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PreferLevelType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Used to specify a preference level for something that is or will be requested (e.g. a supplier of a service, a type of service, a form of payment, etc.).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:NMTOKEN"> <xs:enumeration value="Only"/> <xs:enumeration value="Unacceptable"/> <xs:enumeration value="Preferred"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="AllowedExcludedPreferLevelType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Used to specify a preference level for something that is or will be requested (e.g. a supplier of a service, a type of service, a form of payment, etc.). Available levels: "Only" and "Unacceptable".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Only"/> <xs:enumeration value="Unacceptable"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ValidatingCarrierPreferLevelType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Used to specify a preference level for ValidatingCarrier. For adding new enums see PreferLevelType.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:NMTOKEN"> <xs:enumeration value="Unacceptable"/> <xs:enumeration value="Preferred"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="IntelliSellRequestType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>IntelliSell Type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ServiceTagType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>IntelliSell Type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PartitionIDType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9A-Z]{2,4}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--END PartitionIDType--> <xs:simpleType name="LnIATAType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9A-F]{6}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--END LnIATAType--> <xs:simpleType name="ServiceNameType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9a-zA-Z,]{1,8}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--END ServiceNameType--> <xs:simpleType name="BillingActionCodeType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="5"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--END BillingActionCodeType--> <xs:simpleType name="AgentDepartmentCodeType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="6"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--END AgentDepartmentCodeType--> <xs:simpleType name="AgentFunctionType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="3"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--END AgentFunctionType--> <xs:simpleType name="ARCNumberType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{1,14}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--END ARCNumberType--> <xs:simpleType name="ISellWeekDaysType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Value format: First letter of the name of the day or '_', eg. 'SMT___S' means we are interested in departing at Saturday, Sunday, Monday or Tuesday. Even if there are schedules for Wednesday, Thursday or Friday, they won't be returned in ISell response.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[S_][M_][T_][W_][T_][F_][S_]"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ISellDateType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>IntelliSell Date type (required format: YYYY-MM-DD)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--END ISellDateType--> <xs:simpleType name="ISellDateTimeType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>IntelliSell DateTime type with optional seconds component (required format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}T[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}(:[0-9]{2})?"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--END ISellDateTimeType--> <xs:simpleType name="ISellDateOptTimeType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>IntelliSell DateTime type with optional time component (required format: YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}(T[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2})?"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--END ISellDateOptTimeType--> <xs:simpleType name="IntDateTime"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>IntelliSell Date Time type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}T[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="TransactionType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>IntelliSell Type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="RequestType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identifier of the type of request.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:simpleContent> <xs:extension base="IntelliSellRequestType"> <xs:attribute name="Name" type="xs:string"/> </xs:extension> </xs:simpleContent> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ServiceTag" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identifier of the transaction path.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:simpleContent> <xs:extension base="ServiceTagType"> <xs:attribute name="Name" type="xs:string"/> </xs:extension> </xs:simpleContent> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CustomerProfile" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Name" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Customer profile name.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="40"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PurchaseType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A target available for user, that can be used to create specific rules. For example, if the client wants to target preferred customer request, we can use this element to achieve this.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Name" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SabreAth" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Sabre authentication ID (ATH) - passed into the request to keep session information when communicating with TPF. The use of this element had been deprecated and is achieved by session pooling mechanism in Intellisell.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Value" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="BinarySecToken" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="ConversationID" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TranID" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Transaction ID.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Value" type="xs:string" use="optional"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ClientSessionID" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A unique identifier to relate all transactions within a single session. Used by AirShop/LFE transactions.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Value" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Branch" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Attribute of the Rule that can be passed in to selectively target a rule. This has been deprecated.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Name" type="xs:string" default="Main"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CompressResponse" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Decides if the response should be compressed.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Value" type="xs:boolean" default="false"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="FareOverrides" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Contains a sequence of fare overrides.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="FareOverride" maxOccurs="4"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Contains attributes of the FareGroup functionality used during shopping and pricing. If passed in this request, it will override setting in the rule.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="VendorPref" type="CompanyNamePrefType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Specify vendors to include and exclude from the response.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TPA_Extensions" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">This is a place holder for additional elements.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <!--Axis generates incorrect code when an element has one unbounded child element or child element maxOccurs is greater than 1, hence added a place holder TPA_Extensions child element--> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="FareType" type="xs:string" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Attribute of FareGroup functionality, used in search of fares during shopping.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="PseudoCityCode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="CorporateID" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Attribute of FareGroup functionality, used in search of fares during shopping.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="Callable" type="xs:string" use="optional" default="true"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicator to enable/disable this FareOverride.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Diagnostics" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>For internal use</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Diagnostic" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Specify diagnostic code and which service to sent it to.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="DiagnosticArgument" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Name-value pairs to be used as arguments for the diagnostic.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Name" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="Value" type="xs:string" use="optional"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TPA_Extensions" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">This is a place holder for additional elements.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <!--Axis generates incorrect code when an element has one unbounded child element or child element maxOccurs is greater than 1, hence added a place holder TPA_Extensions child element--> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="Target" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="Code" type="DiagnosticName" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SubagentData" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Subagent data for LFE transactions.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Code" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ResponseSorting" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Settings for IntelliSell merchandising</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="EnableChronologicalSorting" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:attribute name="SortFaresInsideItin" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SeatStatusSim" type="SeatStatusSimType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="AvailableLevel" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Value" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ATSETest" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Allows ATSE Team to test new features. This element and its content is meant to never be published.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Feature" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Meaning of that attribute is dependent on MIP Team, ISell sends it in all ShoppingRequests when specified.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="Debug" type="xs:boolean"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Turns on or off debug mode.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="DebugKey" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Key unlocking disabled debug mode.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="ConfigSet" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Alternative configuration selector.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="DisableCache" type="xs:boolean"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Disables itinerary cache for this request (if it is enabled in this service).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="ChunkNumber" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Helps Forwarder in keeping track of response parts generated as a result of request processing (AB only).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="ShowItinSource" type="xs:boolean"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">If enabled, Intellisell will return source for each itinerary.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="DiversityControlType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">These parameters control how IntellSell should select itineraries based not necessarily on cheapest price, but also on other criteria that guarantee a diverse response.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="LowFareBucket"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Options" type="CountOrPercentage" use="optional"/> <xs:attribute name="FareCutOff" type="IntPercentage" use="optional"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Dimensions"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="TravelTime" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Weight" type="SumWeight" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Carrier" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Default" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Options" type="CountOrPercentage" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Override" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Code" type="CarrierCode" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="Options" type="CountOrPercentage" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="Weight" type="SumWeight" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="OnlineIndicator" type="xs:boolean" default="false"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="OperatingDuplicate" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="PreferredCarrier" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Code" type="CarrierCode" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="Weight" type="SumWeight" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="InboundOutboundPairing" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Weight" type="SumWeight" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="Duplicates" type="xs:positiveInteger" default="1"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TimeOfDay" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Distribution" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Exactly one attribute: either Direction or Leg must be provided</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Range" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="4"> <xs:complexType> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Either all Range elements shall contain attribute Options or none. Ranges shall not overlap.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:attribute name="Begin" type="HH_MM" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="End" type="HH_MM" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="Options" type="CountOrPercentage" use="optional"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="Direction" type="OutboundOrInbound" use="optional"/> <xs:attribute name="Leg" type="xs:positiveInteger" use="optional"/> <xs:attribute name="Endpoint" type="DepartureOrArrival" default="Departure"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="Weight" type="SumWeight" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="StopsNumber" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Weight" type="SumWeight" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="PriceWeight" type="SumWeight" default="10"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--END DiversityControlType--> <xs:complexType name="AwardShoppingType"> <xs:attribute name="Enable" type="xs:boolean" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Enable award shopping.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="UseRAS" type="xs:boolean" default="false"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Use Redemption Availability Service</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <!--END AwardShoppingType--> <xs:simpleType name="TimeWindowBoundaryType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>IntelliSell Time Window Boundary type in format HHMM.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="([0-1][0-9]|2[0-3])[0-5][0-9]"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="TimeWindowType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>IntelliSell Time Window type in format HHMMHHMM.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="([0-2][0-9][0-5][0-9]){2}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CorporateIDType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Corporate ID</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Za-z]{3}[0-9]{2}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DiagnosticName"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Za-z0-9_]+(/[A-Za-z0-9_]+)*"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="AncillaryFeeGroupCodeList"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="([A-Z]{2}(-[1-9])?(,[A-Z]{2}(-[1-9])?){0,4})?"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ClassOfServiceType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]{1,2}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="LocationACType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Type of location specifying if it is a city or an airport. Cannot appear without LocationCode.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[AC]{1}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FareBasisCodePatternType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>One to fifteen character Fare Basis Code. Uppercase letters, numbers and wildcards "-" "?" "^" are allowed. Minus (-): zero or more characters. Question mark (?): exactly one character. Caret followed by an uppercase letter or a number (^X): exactly one character, excluding X (replace X with the charter you want to reject).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="15"/> <xs:pattern value="([A-Z0-9?-]|^[A-Z0-9])+"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="FareBasisType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Single requested Fare Basis Code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:attribute name="Code" type="FareBasisCodePatternType" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="ReservationStatusType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]{1,2}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="SeatStatusSimType"> <xs:attribute name="Type" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="Command" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="StopoverType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">To specify informations about stopover</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="DepartureDateTime" type="IntDateTime"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This date should be of the form YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="DepartureWindow" type="TimeWindowType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This should be of the form HHMMHHMM.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="StopoverPoint"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Stopover point - for example, air uses the IATA 3 letter code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="LocationCode" type="AirportCode" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="LocationType" type="LocationACType" use="optional"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="DateRangeType"> <xs:attribute name="OutboundDate" type="xs:date"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Outbound date</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="DateRange" type="xs:short"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Number of date range</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PointOfSaleOverrideType"> <xs:attribute name="Code" type="StringLength1to8" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PointOfTicketingOverrideType"> <xs:attribute name="Code" type="StringLength1to8" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ApplyResidentDiscountType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Apply resident discount in CLFE.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:attribute name="Ind" type="xs:boolean" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <!--*********************************************************
Customize by carrier and routing specific types
********************************************************--> <xs:simpleType name="RoutingAirlineCodeType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\*"/> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z][A-Z0-9]{1}"/> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z0-9][A-Z][A-Z0-9]?"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="RoutingAirportCodeType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\*"/> <xs:pattern value="\?"/> <xs:pattern value="\+"/> <xs:pattern value="\."/> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]{3,5}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="RoutingDefinitionType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Definition of a routing</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="RoutingLeg" type="RoutingLegType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="AddWildcards" type="xs:boolean" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>If true, wildcards will be automatically inserted between each two leg (RoutingLeg) elements. Will be set to 'false' if not present.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="RoutingLegType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Definition of individual routing legs, at least one leg must be present.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="InboundOutboundCarrier" type="RoutingAirlineCodeType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="InboundCarrier" type="RoutingAirlineCodeType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="OutboundCarrier" type="RoutingAirlineCodeType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="ConnectPoint" type="RoutingAirportCodeType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:group name="MultipleDatesGroup"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:element name="Day"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Date" type="ISellDateType" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="DaysRange"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="FromDate" type="ISellDateType" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="ToDate" type="ISellDateType" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="WeekDays" type="ISellWeekDaysType"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:group> <xs:group name="SourceGroup"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="RequestorID" type="UniqueID_Type"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">An identifier of the entity making the request (e.g. ATA/IATA/ID number, Electronic Reservation Service Provider (ERSP), Association of British Travel Agents (ABTA)).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Position" type="PositionType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="BookingChannel" type="SourceBookingChannelType" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:group> <!--END SourceGroup--> <xs:complexType name="SourceBookingChannelType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Specifies the booking channel type and whether it is the primary means of connectivity of the source.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="BookingChannelType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="CompanyName" type="CompanyNameType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Identifies the company that is associated with the booking channel.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <!--END SourceBookingChannelType--> <xs:attributeGroup name="SourceAttributeGroup"> <xs:attribute name="AgentSine" type="StringLength1to16" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Identifies the party within the requesting entity.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="PseudoCityCode" type="StringLength1to16" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">An identification code assigned to an office/agency by a reservation system.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="ISOCountry" type="ISO3166" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The country code of the requesting party.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="ISOCurrency" type="AlphaLength3" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The currency code in which the reservation will be ticketed.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="AgentDutyCode" type="StringLength1to16" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">An authority code assigned to a requestor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="AirlineVendorID" type="UpperCaseAlphaNumericLength2to3" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The IATA assigned airline code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="AirportCode" type="UpperCaseAlphaNumericLength3to5" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The IATA assigned airport code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="FirstDepartPoint" type="StringLength3" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The point of first departure in a trip.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="ERSP_UserID" type="StringLength1to16" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Electronic Reservation Service Provider (ERSP) assigned identifier used to identify the individual using the ERSP system.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="PersonalCityCode" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">City code part of Office Accounting Code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9A-Z]{3,4}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="AccountingCode" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Accounting Code part of Office Accounting Code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9a-zA-Z]{2,3}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="OfficeCode" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Office Code part of Office Accounting Code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{7}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="DefaultTicketingCarrier" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Default Ticketing Carrier for Office Accounting Code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z0-9]{2}[A-Z]?"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="AirlineChannelCode" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Airline Channel Code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]{3}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="AgentDepartmentCode" type="AgentDepartmentCodeType" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Agent department code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="AgentFunction" type="AgentFunctionType" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Agent function</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="TravelAgencyIATA" type="ARCNumberType" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Travel agency IATA</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="HomeAgencyIATA" type="ARCNumberType" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Home agency user</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:attributeGroup> <!--END SourceAttributeGroup--> <xs:attributeGroup name="ExtendedSourceAttributeGroup"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Contains optional attributes that can occur only in /OTA_AirLowFareSearchRQ/POS/Source.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:attribute name="AgentCity" type="AlphaLength3"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Agent city</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="Carrier" type="CarrierCode" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Carrier</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="MainTravelAgencyPCC" type="StringLength1to16"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Main travel agency PCC</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="HomePCC" type="StringLength1to16" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Home PCC</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:attributeGroup> <!--END ExtendedSourceAttributeGroup--> <xs:attributeGroup name="OriginDestinationFlightAttributeGroup"> <xs:attribute name="Number" type="xs:short" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Flight number</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="DepartureDateTime" type="ISellDateTimeType" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Departure date and time</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="ArrivalDateTime" type="ISellDateTimeType" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Arrival date and time</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="MarriageStatus" type="xs:string" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Marriage status</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="Type" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Flight type (A: Air Segment, K: ARUNK, O: Open Segment)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[AKO]"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="Flown" type="xs:boolean" use="optional" default="false"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Specify whether the flight is flown.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:attributeGroup> <!--END OriginDestinationFlightAttributeGroup--> <xs:complexType name="AirlineType"> <xs:attribute name="Operating" type="CarrierCode" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Operating airline code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <!--END AirlineType--> <xs:complexType name="ReservationType"> <xs:attribute name="Status" type="ReservationStatusType" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Reservation status</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="RealStatus" type="ReservationStatusType" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Real reservation status</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <!--This is optional only for Exchange//Reservation--> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <!--END ReservationType--> <xs:complexType name="SideTripType"> <xs:attribute name="Number" type="xs:short" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Side trip start</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="End" type="xs:boolean" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Side trip end</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <!--END SideTripType--> <xs:complexType name="MileageDisplayType"> <xs:attribute name="Type" type="xs:string" use="required"> <xs:annotation> xml:lang="en">Mileage surcharge percentage</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <!--END MileageDisplayType--> <xs:complexType name="IncludeVendorPrefType"> name="AllianceType"> <xs:attribute name="Code" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Identifies an alliance by the alliance code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> name="DepartureDaysType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Specify which days of week to consider for departure.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:attribute name="Value" use="required"> <xs:element name="SegmentType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Code" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>"Code" can be "ARUNK", "O" for normal, or "X" for connection.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="ARUNK"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Arrival unknown</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="O"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Normal</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="X"> <xs:annotation> If the cabin type is not specified at both the leg/segment level and request level a default cabin of "Economy" will be used?</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ConnectionTime" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Connection time between segments.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Min" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Fare component number</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="BasisCode" type="FareBasisCodeType" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Fare basis code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="Amount" type="Money" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Fare amount (note: last Flight in Fare Component)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attributeGroup ref="VCTRAttributeGroup"/> <xs:attributeGroup ref="BrandAttributeGroup"/> </xs:complexType> <!--END FareDetailsType--> <xs:complexType name="PlusUpType"> <xs:attribute name="Amount" type="Money" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Amount</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="OriginCity" type="AlphaLength3" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Origin City</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="DestinationCity" type="AlphaLength3" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Destination City</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="FareOriginCity" type="AlphaLength3" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Fare Origin City</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="FareDestinationCity" type="AlphaLength3" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Fare Destination City</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="ViaCity" type="AlphaLength3" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Via City</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="Message" type="xs:string" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Message</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="CountryOfPayment" type="ISO3166" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Country of payment</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <!--END PlusUpType--> <xs:complexType name="SurchargeType"> <xs:attribute name="Type" type="xs:string" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="Amount" type="Money" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Amount</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="Currency" type="CurrencyCodeType" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Currency</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <!--END SurchargeType--> <xs:group name="OriginDestinationFlightFareGroup"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Fare" type="FareOptionalDetailsType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="PlusUp" type="PlusUpType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:group> <xs:group name="ExchangeOriginDestinationFlightFareGroup"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Fare"> <xs:complexType> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="FareDetailsType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Adjustment" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Value" type="FloatSignedCountOrPercentage" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Adjustment Value, can be positive or negative, number or percentage</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="Currency" type="AlphaLength3"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Currency of Adjustment's Value</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="Group" type="xs:short"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Markup/Discount Group</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PlusUp" type="PlusUpType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="Surcharge" type="SurchargeType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:group> <!--END OriginDestinationFlightFareGroup--> <xs:attributeGroup name="ExchangeOriginDestinationFlightAttributeGroup"> <xs:attribute name="ClassOfService" type="ClassOfServiceType" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Class of service</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:attributeGroup> <xs:attributeGroup name="VCTRAttributeGroup"> <xs:attribute name="Vendor" type="xs:string" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Vendor (note: last Flight in Fare Component)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="SourceVendor" type="CarrierCode" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Fare Source Vendor (note: last Flight in Fare Component)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="Tariff" type="xs:string" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Tariff (note: last Flight in Fare Component)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="RuleNumber" type="xs:string" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Rule Number (note: last Flight in Fare Component)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:attributeGroup> <xs:attributeGroup name="BrandAttributeGroup"> <xs:attribute name="BrandID" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Used to indicate brand code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:token"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="ProgramID" type="xs:int"/> </xs:attributeGroup> <!--END ExchangeOriginDestinationFlightAttributeGroup--> <xs:complexType name="ExchangeOriginDestinationFlightType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:group ref="OriginDestinationFlightGroup"/> <xs:group ref="ExchangeOriginDestinationFlightFareGroup"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attributeGroup ref="OriginDestinationFlightAttributeGroup"/> <xs:attributeGroup ref="ExchangeOriginDestinationFlightAttributeGroup"/> </xs:complexType> <!--END ExchangeOriginDestinationFlightType--> <xs:complexType name="ExchangeOriginDestinationInformationType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="OriginDestinationInformationType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Flight" type="ExchangeOriginDestinationFlightType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:group ref="OriginDestinationInformationTPA_ExtensionsGroup"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <!--END ExchangeOriginDestinationInformationType--> <xs:complexType name="ExchangeTravelPreferencesTPA_ExtensionsType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:group ref="TravelPreferencesTPA_ExtensionsTaxesGroup"/> <xs:element name="SettlementMethod" type="SettlementMethodType" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--END ExchangeTravelPreferencesTPA_ExtensionsType--> <xs:complexType name="ExchangeAirSearchPrefsType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="TPA_Extensions" type="ExchangeTravelPreferencesTPA_ExtensionsType" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="ValidInterlineTicket" type="xs:boolean" use="optional" default="false"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Request itins that are validated on base of interline ticketing aggrement.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <!--END ExchangeAirSearchPrefsType--> <xs:attributeGroup name="ExchangeAttributeGroup"> <xs:attribute name="OriginalTktIssueDateTime" type="ISellDateOptTimeType" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Original ticket issue date and time</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="ExchangedTktIssueDateTime" type="ISellDateOptTimeType" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Exchanged ticket issue date and time</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="PreviousExchangeDateTime" type="ISellDateOptTimeType" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Previous exchange date and time</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="NumberOfTaxBoxes" type="xs:short" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Number of tax boxes</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="BypassAdvancePurchaseOption" type="CharacterType" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Bypass Advance Purchase Option</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:attributeGroup> <!--END ExchangeAttributeGroup--> <xs:complexType name="ExchangeTPA_ExtensionsType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="AwardShopping" type="AwardShoppingType" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--END ExchangeTPA_ExtensionsType--> <xs:complexType name="ExchangeType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Fare" type="ExchangeFareType"/> <xs:element name="POS" type="ExchangePOSType"/> <xs:group ref="ExchangeOriginDestinationOrArunkGroup"/> <xs:element name="TravelPreferences" type="ExchangeAirSearchPrefsType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="TravelerInfoSummary" type="TravelerInfoSummaryType"/> <xs:element name="TPA_Extensions" type="ExchangeTPA_ExtensionsType" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attributeGroup ref="ExchangeAttributeGroup"/> </xs:complexType> <!--END ExchangeType--> <!--END Exchange Shopping--> <!--BEGIN FlexibleFaresType--> <xs:complexType name="FlexibleFaresType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="FareParameters" maxOccurs="10"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This element specifies parameters for desired fare.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ExcludeRestricted" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Setting this to true means the same as setting ResTicketing, MinMaxStay and RefundPenalty to false.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Ind" type="xs:boolean" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ResTicketing" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>If set to true, fares that have a reservation/ticketing can be included in the responses. If set to false, then no fares that include reservation/ticketing requirement will be included in the response. This is negation of XA qualifier.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Ind" type="xs:boolean" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="MinMaxStay" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>If set to true, fares that have a min/max stay can be included in the responses. If set to false, then no fares that include a min/max stay requirement will be included in the response. This is negation of XS qualifier.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Ind" type="xs:boolean" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="RefundPenalty" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>If set to true, fares that have a refund penalty can be included in the responses. If set to false, then no fares that include a refund penalty requirement will be included in the response. This is negation of XP qualifier.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Ind" type="xs:boolean" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PublicFare" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">This element finds only public fares.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Ind" type="xs:boolean" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PrivateFare" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">This element finds only private fares.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Ind" type="xs:boolean" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Cabin" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">This element specifies preffered cabin type.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Type" type="CabinType" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PassengerType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">This element specifies PTC used to find this fare.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Code" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Specify traveler type code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:union memberTypes="StringLength1to8 OTA_CodeType"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="NegotiatedFaresOnly" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">If set to true then returned fares need to match AcccountCode/CorpID specified in Fare Group definition on all fare components.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Ind" type="xs:boolean" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="XOFares" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">If set to true only fares matching PTC specified in the Flex Fare Group will be returned on all fare components.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Ind" type="xs:boolean" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="UsePassengerFares" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">At least one fare component for each passenger type must be applicable for that passenger type.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Ind" type="xs:boolean" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="UseNegotiatedFares" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Returned fares need to match AcccountCode/CorporateID specified in Fare Group definition on at least one fare component.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Ind" type="xs:boolean" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PassengerTypeQuantity" type="PassengerTypeQuantityType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="4"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Define information on the number of passengers of a specific type.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="JumpCabinLogic" type="JumpCabinLogicType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="KeepSameCabin" type="KeepSameCabinType" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="VoluntaryChanges" type="VoluntaryChangesSMPType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Identifies whether penalties associated with voluntary changes should be included in the search results.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:choice maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:element name="CorporateID" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Code" type="CorporateIDType" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AccountCode" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Code" type="StringLength1to20" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:choice> <xs:element name="ClassOfService" type="ClassOfServiceElemType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Requested booking code for whole flex fare</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="FareBasis" type="FareBasisType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Fare Basis Codes requested for whole flexible fare</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Leg" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Defines legs for flexible fares</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ClassOfService" type="ClassOfServiceElemType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Requested booking code per flex fare leg</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="FareBasis" type="FareBasisType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Fare Basis Codes requested for flexible fare leg</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Cabin" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">This element specifies preffered cabin type for flexible fare leg</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Type" type="CabinType" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="Num" type="xs:short" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--END FlexibleFaresType--> <xs:complexType name="AlternatePCCType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="TravelPreferences" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="VendorPref" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="Code" type="StringLength1to8" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Identifies a company by the company code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="PreferLevel" type="PreferLevelType" default="Preferred"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TPA_Extensions" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="IncludeAlliancePref" type="AllianceType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Consider only these alliances.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ExcludeAlliancePref" type="AllianceType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Do not consider these alliances.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="PseudoCityCode" type="StringLength1to16" use="required"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">An identification code assigned to an office/agency by a reservation system.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="InterlineBrandsType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Brand" type="BrandType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Brand list to be returned</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="ChangeBrandForSoldout" type="xs:boolean" use="optional" default="false"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>If specific XX brand is not available for requested date/flight, another cheapest brand will be returned combined with available XX brand.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="BrandType"> <xs:attribute name="Code" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ClassOfServiceElemType"> <xs:attribute name="Code" type="ClassOfServiceType" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CachePartitionType"> <xs:attribute name="Name" type="PartitionNameType" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CachePartitionGroupType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Partition" type="CachePartitionType" minOccurs="2" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="PartitionNameType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z0-9_]{1,}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CarrierType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Used to specify if carrier type is marketing or operating.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:NMTOKEN"> <xs:enumeration value="Marketing"/> <xs:enumeration value="Operating"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BaggageRequestType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A - only allowance data, C - charge and allowance data, N - no data,</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="A"/> <xs:enumeration value="C"/> <xs:enumeration value="N"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CommissionCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> <xs:minLength value="2"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="VerificationItinCallLogicType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>L - look for the lowest fare (default), M - look in the requested RBD, and requested pricing qualifiers, B - perform two above searches, and return both fares,</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="L"/> <xs:enumeration value="M"/> <xs:enumeration value="B"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>
